content.rendered: The QHSE Department of TTE Facilities Management organized an Electrical Safety Stand-Down across multiple sites & ECIG HQ. The objective was to heighten safety awareness and reinforce best practices when working with electricity. The Management of TTE FM, engineers, supervisors, and QHSE personnel shared valuable insights to ensure a safe working environment. This initiative demonstrates TTE’s commitment to the safety & well-being of our people and facilities to mitigate electrical hazards.
